channel.title: Swimming on YOUR DAILY LIMERICK
channel.description: Recent content in Swimming on limericks.dailyonthis.site

item.description: A doctor so clever and nimble, Would swim with a stroke so simple. In the pool she’d dive, And feel so alive, With a form that was oh so …
There once was a chef so brave, Who went for a swim in the wave. He donned a red suit That made quite a toot, For his swimming was truly …
A musical man from the town, Decided to go for a swim around. The waves he did ride, With strokes so wide, He was known for his swimming …
A biologist out for a swim Tried to observe every fin That fluttered by In the crystalline sky Til the sun began to dim.
An artist who wanted to swim Took to the sea with a grin She jumped in the waves No water she’d save And happily went for a swim!
A fashion designer, swimming in the sea, Had an outfit that made the waves feel glee. It was a sight to see With its bright neon hues And it …
An editor found swimming so grand, He’d never learned it, but he’d planned To dive in the pool And learn the basic rules He was determined, …
A geologist went out for a swim, On a hot summer’s day, quite trim. He dove and he splashed, Though the rocks he had bashed, As he looked …
A teacher who went for a swim, Their toes never quite touched the rim. They splashed and they played, And made many a wave, Their lessons …
A tour guide named Evan, while swimming, had a yen To show off his skills and his daring He would jump in the sea And impress all with glee …
A banker by trade who did swim, In the pool his skills were quite slim. He’d float and he’d sink, Though with effort he’d think That he …
A talented producer was swimming, His laps were quite inspiring; He’d take a deep dive And then come alive With ideas he found while …
A dancer was swimming, it seemed rather odd, Though it was not a dance, it still felt like a trod. He cut through the waves, Not missing a …
A curious researcher did swim, Through an ocean of knowledge so dim. He explored and he searched, All that he learned, To uncover a truth he …
There once was a guitarist so brave, Who liked to swim in a wave. It was quite a sight, A rocker who could fight, The wildest of waters to …
A cowboy went for a swim one day, Despite his horse’s dismay. The beast had a fit, But the cowboy would not quit His swim in the waters so …
A carpenter who was rather keen Took a dip in the pond ever serene He paddled around Without a sound His tools left to rust on the green.
